executors.name: main
executors.exec_start:
DAEMON=/home/action/apps/hooto-press/bin/hooto-press
DAEMON_ARGS="-log_dir=/home/action/apps/hooto-press/var/log -minloglevel=1 -logtolevels=true"
NAME=hooto-press

if pidof $NAME; then
    exit 0
fi

mkdir -p /home/action/apps/hooto-press/
rsync -av {{.inpack_prefix_hooto_press}}/* /home/action/apps/hooto-press/

$DAEMON $DAEMON_ARGS >> /home/action/var/log/hooto-press.log 2>&1 &

sleep 1
exit 0
